description: You awaken in a decaying log cabin deep in the woods. A storm rages outside. The smell of mildew and something metallic fills the air.

rooms.description: A flickering candle casts shadows across the warped floorboards. A locked door creaks in the wind.
Dust and cobwebs blanket old furniture. A cracked mirror reflects your pale face.
Moisture drips from the ceiling. Rusted chains hang from the walls.

candle.name: Flickering Candle
candle.description: A half-melted candle providing dim, wavering light.

use.successMessage: The candle flickers, casting eerie shadows on the walls. Its light is weak but comforting.

locked_door.name: Locked Door
locked_door.description: A heavy wooden door with rusty hinges. It's locked tight.

use.failureMessage: The door is locked. You need a key.

crumpled_note.name: Crumpled Note
crumpled_note.description: A water-stained note with barely legible handwriting.

cracked_mirror.name: Cracked Mirror
cracked_mirror.description: An old mirror with a spider web of cracks across its surface.

use.failureMessage: The mirror shows nothing in the darkness.

wooden_chest.name: Wooden Chest
wooden_chest.description: A dusty old chest with a rusted lock.

old_lantern.name: Old Lantern
old_lantern.description: A rusted lantern that might still work.

use.failureMessage: The lantern needs to be lit first.

iron_key.name: Iron Key
iron_key.description: An ornate iron key covered in strange engravings.

chains.name: Rusted Chains
chains.description: Heavy chains hanging from the wall, covered in rust.

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: The skeletal remains of someone who wasn't so lucky.
